citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an adequate program of pest control for flies. The primary enclosure housing 7 Egyptian fruit
bats has too numerous to count flies swarming around the inside of the enclosure. There are flies of various sizes
observed on the walls of the primary enclosure as well as swarming around and resting on the fresh fruit hanging in the
enclosure that is provided to the bats as their primary source of food.
Flies and other pests can harbor and transmit diseases which might impact the health and well-being of the animals. The
facility must establish and maintain an effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and
mammalian pests. Correct by establishing a safe and effective program for the control of insects and by maintaining an
effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests.
Correct by 16 June 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
The facility does not have an adequate program of pest control for flies. The primary enclosure housing 7 Egyptian fruit 
bats has too numerous to count flies swarming around the inside of the enclosure. There are flies of various sizes 
observed on the walls of the primary enclosure as well as swarming around and resting on the fresh fruit hanging in the 
enclosure that is provided to the bats as their primary source of food. 
 
Flies and other pests can harbor and transmit diseases which might impact the health and well-being of the animals. The 
facility must establish and maintain an effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and 
mammalian pests. Correct by establishing a safe and effective program for the control of insects and by maintaining an 
effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests.  
Correct by 16 June 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
